description: Retrospective permission for the erection of a single storey side extension, single storey rear extension, rear roof extension with hip to gable conversion with front & side roof windows, front porch and detached outbuilding in the rear garden following demolition of existing garage.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Unnumbered location plan, 2024/KK/01, 2024/KK/02, 2024/KK/03, 2024/KK/04,  2024/KK/05,  2024/KK/06, 2024/KK/07, fire safety statement, block plan proposed/fire strategy plan 
Received: 18/03/2024].

Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.

Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area
Condition : 3 - No additional windows or openings shall be formed in the elevations of the development hereby permitted.
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' privacy
Condition : 4 - The detached single storey outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose incidental to the enjoyment of the single family dwellinghouse (Use Class C3) at the 'Site Address' described at the top of this decision letter and for no other purpose (for example, it may not be used as a self-contained dwelling or contain a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen or other primary residential accommodation, nor may it be used for business purposes). 
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' living conditions and the character of the area.
Condition : 5 - The extension hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose ancillary to the enjoyment of the single family dwellinghouse (Use Class C3) at the 'Site Address' described at the top of this decision letter and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes.
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' living conditions and the character of the area.
Condition : 6 - The windows formed in the southern side elevation shall be obscure-glazed and non-opening below 1.7 metres above internal floor level. The windows shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than in accordance with the requirements of this condition. 
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' privacy
